citation.article-title: Arcanobacterium bialowiezense sp. nov. and Arcanobacterium bonasi sp. nov., isolated from the prepuce of European bison bulls (Bison bonasus) suffering from balanoposthitis, and emended description of the genus Arcanobacterium Collins et al. 1983.
citation.source: International Journal of Systematic and Evolutionary Microbiology

p.s: Emended description of the genus Arcanobacterium Collins et al. 1983
In contrast to the original description of the genus, some species do not contain a quinone system with menaquinone MK-9(H4) as the major compound; MK-10(H4) can also predominate.
Other characteristics of the genus are as given by Collins et al. (1982).
